entities.name: luna
entities.description: Luna is described as having peculiar views on Gernumbli magic. She is also mentioned to be sucking her finger in a dreamy fashion.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as looking smart and is asked by Luna's father if he wants to put anything on his bite.

entities.name: xenophilius lovegood
entities.description: Xenophilius Lovegood is described as wearing an unusual outfit that resembles an omelet.

entities.name: ronald
entities.description: Ronald (Ron) is scolded by Auntie Muriel for having hair that's too long and is mistaken for Ginevra.

entities.name: ginevra
entities.description: Ginevra is mentioned as someone who might be confused with Ron due to their similar appearance.

entities.name: barny
entities.description: Barny is introduced as Harry's cousin.

relationships.description: Luna and Xenophilius Lovegood are described as a father-daughter pair.
Harry is introduced as Barny's cousin.
